original_title: CID records 7 hour statement from Former Health Minister Keheliya Rambukwella
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Former Minister of Health Keheliya Rambukwella recorded a statement today at the Criminal Investigation Department regarding the controversial human immunoglobulin transaction.
The Criminal Investigation Department says that they recorded a statement from the Minister for seven and a half hours.
The statement was recorded from the Minister at his residence from 9:00 am to 4:15 pm.
